value.name: Republicans Begin New Congress Feuding Over Bid to Overturn Election
value.description: After four years of enabling and appeasing President Trump, Republicans find themselves at the end of his tenure in exactly the place they had so desperately tried to avoid: a toxic internecine brawl

value.name: Podcast helps save Curtis Flowers from death row
value.description: Curtis Flowers spent nearly half his life in prison for the murders of four people and may still be on death row if not for the investigative work of a podcast.

value.name: Woman killed, 3 deputies wounded in shooting outside nightclub
value.description: A woman was killed and three sheriff's deputies were wounded when a gunman opened fire early Sunday during a fight in the parking lot of a Houston nightclub, authorities said.   The shooting erupted

value.name: Biden inauguration to feature virtual, nationwide parade
value.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President-elect Joe Biden's inauguration will include a "virtual parade across America” consistent with crowd limits during the coronavirus era, organizers announced Sunday.

value.name: Trump turns up heat on Georgia Republican in fight to overturn election loss
value.description: Georgia's Republican secretary of state, Brad Raffensperger, cemented his status as an unlikely hero for U.S. Democrats following a fresh clash in which he rejected President Donald Trump's claims

value.name: Pope criticizes people going on holiday to avoid Covid-19 lockdowns
value.description: Pope Francis has condemned people who traveled abroad for a vacation and avoid Covid-19 lockdowns, adding that holidaymakers were not considering the effect of their actions on others.

value.name: Asia shares given pause by Tokyo lockdown talk
value.description: Asian share markets resumed their ascent on Monday as investors pinned their hope on vaccines to eventually deliver a global economic upturn, even as a possible tightening in virus rules for Tokyo

value.name: US coronavirus: California reports more than 45,000 new coronavirus cases as surge continues into new year
value.description: California reported Sunday that 45,352 people newly tested positive for Covid-19, continuing a surge that has pushed hospitals and their exhausted staff to the brink.

value.name: Fauci: Vaccinations are ramping up in a `glimmer of hope'
value.description: The U.S. ramped up COVID-19 vaccinations in the past few days after a slower-than-expected start, bringing to 4 million the number of Americans who have received shots, Dr. Anthony Fauci said Sunday.

value.name: Pastor killed in shooting at Texas church
value.description: The pastor of Starrville Methodist Church in East Texas was fatally shot by an unidentified suspect, who was later caught by authorities.

value.name: Head-on crash kills 7 kids, 2 adults in California
value.description: The children were members of two related families traveling in a truck that was struck by around 8 p.m. by a Dodge SUV

value.name: Kenosha prepares for charging decision on police shooting
value.description: The city of Kenosha, Wisconsin, is preparing for protests when a charging decision comes in the police shooting of Jacob Blake, officials said Sunday. A decision is expected within the next two weeks.
